nodes.text: The Kyoloria system was a star system that was located within the Xappyh sector, which was a part of the Outer Rim Territories region of the galaxy. The system was the origin point of the Kyolorian snake-god deity.
The Kyoloria system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square Q-3.
